about_the_game:
Are you ready to build the most fraudulent empire the world has ever seen? In Con Clicker, you’ll take on the role of a shady TV infomercial tycoon, scamming unsuspecting viewers into buying absurd products. Click your way to success, automate your operations, and become the ultimate kingpin of deception!

Click, Scam, Repeat

  • Start small by running your first infomercial and selling hilariously over-the-top products. From miracle mops to immortality insurance, there's no limit to what you can sell to your unsuspecting audience. Watch the cash roll in with every ad run!

Automate and Expand

  • Hire shady managers, unlock advanced upgrades, and automate your infomercial empire to generate viewers and cash while you sleep. Scale your operations from a single channel to a global media scam network, reaping massive rewards with minimal effort.

Prestige and Replayability

  • Got caught scamming? No problem! Rebrand your company, start fresh, and gain powerful bonuses to grow faster and scam harder.

Con Clicker is the ultimate blend of satirical humor and idle game fun. Whether you’re clicking manually or letting your empire run on autopilot, the only question is: how far will you go to con your way to the top?
